GSP29udnyku1u:12: [ku.1.102] iha yadyapi yaṃ kamapi puruṣārthamarthayamānāḥ- śuddhabuddhasvabhāva ityaupaniṣadāḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:28: kiṃ bahunā- kāravo 'pi yaṃ viśvakarmeti upāsate,
GSP29udnyku1u:30: ve bhagavati bhave sandeha eva kutaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:34: śruto hi bhagavān bahuśaḥ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣvidānīṃ mantavyo bhavatiḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:39: [ku.1.104] tadiha saṅkṣepataḥ pañcatayī vipratipattiḥ- alaukikasya paralokasādhanasyābhāvāt ;
GSP29udnyku1u:52: na syādeva vā- na tu kadācit syāt //
GSP29udnyku1u:53: akasmādeva bhavatīti cenna- hetubhūtiniṣedho na svānupākhyavidhirna ca /
GSP29udnyku1u:59: utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ svayamasataḥ svotpattāvaprabhutvena svasmāditi pakṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:64: anupākhyasya hetutve prāgiti satvaprasaktau punaḥ sadātanatvāpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:65: [ku.1.108] syādetat- na akasmāditi kāraṇaniṣedhamātraṃ vā bhavanapratiṣedho vā svātmahetukatvaṃ vā nirupākhyahetukatvaṃ vābhidhitsitam /
GSP29udnyku1u:71: sāvadhītve tu sa eva prācyo heturityucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:73: anyeṣāmapi tatkāle satvāt anyathā tasyaiva nirūpaṇānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:78: na tu te 'pekṣyanta iti svabhāvārtha iti cet-“nāpekṣyanta” iti kor'thaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:88: na hyākāśasya tattvamākasmikamiti sarvasya kiṃ na syāditi vaktumucitam” iti cenna,
GSP29udnyku1u:93_0: nanvevamihāpi sarvadā bhavataḥ kādācitkatvasvabhāvavyāghāta iti tulyaḥ parihāraḥ-
GSP29udnyku1u:93_1: na tulyaḥ- niravadhitve aniyatāvadhitve vā kādācitkatvavyāghātāt niyatāvadhitve hetuvādābhyupagamāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:104: anupalabhyamānaprākkoṭikaghaṭādiviṣayaṃ nedamaniṣṭamiti cenna- tāvanmātrāvadhisvabhāvatve tadaharvat pūrvedyurapi tamavadhīkṛtya taduttarasya satvaprasaṅgāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:108: tadaharevānena bhavitavyamiti asya svabhāva iti cenna-tasyāpyahnaḥ pūrvanyāyena pūrvamapi satvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:117: evaṃ (yadi) tajjātīyena yataḥ kutaścidbhavitavyamiti asya svabhāvaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:124: kāraṇavyāvṛtyā ca na tajjātīyasyaiva kāryasya vyāvṛttiravasīyeta /
GSP29udnyku1u:148: nirmanthanenāraṇereva pratiphalitataraṇikiraṇairmaṇereveti prakāraniyamavat tenaiva vyajyamānasya kāryajātibhedasya bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:154: [ku.1.120] evaṃ tarhi dhūmādāvapi kaścidanupalakṣaṇīyo viśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29udnyku1u:160: pratyakṣānupalambhagocaro jātibhedo na kāryaprayojaka iti vadato bauddhasya śirasyeṣa prahāraḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:165: tṛṇādīnāṃ viśeṣa eva niyatatvāditi cet-(25) na /
GSP29udnyku1u:176: yathā- pradīpa eka eva timirāpahārī vartivikārakārī rūpāntaravyavahārakārīti cenna- vaicitryāt kāryasya /
GSP29udnyku1u:177: ekasya na kramaḥ kvāpi vaicitryaṃ ca samasya na /
GSP29udnyku1u:184: ayamapi ca kṣaṇabhaṅge parihāro na tu sahakārivāde /
GSP29udnyku1u:197: tathā ca tadāyattatvāddahanasyāpi tattvaṃ kena vāraṇīyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:198: na hi tasmin janayitavye nāsau tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:209: na hi niṣphale duḥkhaikaphale vā kaścideko 'pi prekṣāpūrvakārī ghaṭeta;
GSP29udnyku1u:212: na hīyaṃ pravṛttiḥ svarūpata eva taddhetuḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:219: traividyatapasvino dhūrtavakāḥ eveti cenna- teṣāṃ dṛṣṭasampadaṃ pratyanupayogāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:220: [ku.1.127] sukhārthaṃ tathā karotīti cenna- nāstikairapi tathā karaṇaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29udnyku1u:228: te 'pi vṛddhatarairityevamanādiriti cet- na tarhi vipralipsuḥ kaścidatra,
GSP29udnyku1u:230: idaṃ prathama eva kaścidanuṣṭhāyāpi dhūrtaḥ parān anuṣṭhāpayatīti cet- kimasau sarvalokottara eva;
GSP29udnyku1u:231: yaḥ sarvasvadakṣiṇayā sarvabandhuparityāgena sarvasukhavimukho brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā vā kevalaparavañcana(29)
GSP29udnyku1u:235: kena vā cinhenāyamīdṛśastvayā lokottaraprajñena pratāraka iti nirṇītaḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:237: (31)yataḥ pākhaṇḍābhimateṣvapyevaṃ dṛśyata iti cenna- hetudarśanādarśanābhyāṃ viśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:238: anādau caivambhūte 'nuṣṭhāne pratāyamāne prakārāntaramāśrityāpi bahuvittavyayāyāsopadeśamātreṇa pratāraṇā syāt; (32)
GSP29udnyku1u:241: [ku.1.129] astu dānādhyayanādireva vicitro heturjagadvaicitryasyeti cenna- kṣaṇikatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:247: yena niyatabhogasādhanānīti cet- tadidamamīṣāmatīndriyaṃ rūpaṃ sahakāribhedo vā?
GSP29udnyku1u:254: tādṛśādeva mantrādipratibandhe sati dāho na jāyate;
GSP29udnyku1u:275: na hi vidhirūpeṇāsau tuccha iti svarūpeṇāpi tathā;
GSP29udnyku1u:278: kāraṇatvasya bhāvatvena vyāptatvāttannivṛttau tadapi nivartata iti
GSP29udnyku1u:281: abhāvasyāvarjanīyatayāsannidhiḥ na tu hetutveneti cet- tulyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:283: bhāvasyābhāvotsāraṇaṃ svarūpameveti cet- abhāvasyāpi bhāvotsāraṇaṃ svarūpānnātiricyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:284: tasmāt yathā “bhāvasyaiva bhāvo janaka” iti niyamo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:296: sa cottambhakamantra evetyanyaiva sāmagrīti cet- na,
GSP29udnyku1u:298: na hi daṇḍini sati adaṇḍānāmanyeṣāṃ nābhāvaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:310: bhāve vā kāmamasāvastu; kā no hāniḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:318: anupagṛhītānāṃ ca kathaṃ kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇamiti cet- mā bhūjjātiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:324: arthāt asati na jāyate” iti sthite tadbhāve 'pi tajjātīyāntarābhāvānna bhavitavyaṃ kāryeṇeti (36)
GSP29udnyku1u:337: tathā hi- kāryasyānutpādaḥ prāgabhāvo vā syāt,
GSP29udnyku1u:343: prāgabhāvāvacchedakakālopādhistadapekṣa iti cenna- mantrātpūrvamapi tasya bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:366: na ca mantrādīneva sahakāriṇaḥ prāpya te kāryakāriṇa iti sāmpratam- teṣu ciradhvasteṣvapi kāryotpādāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:370: teṣāmanantatvādanantaphalapravāhaḥ prasajyata iti cet- apūrvepi kalpite tāvāneva
GSP29udnyku1u:388: tadupalakṣitaḥ kālo yajvā vā svargādi sādhayiṣyati kṛtamapūrveṇa /
GSP29udnyku1u:389: [ku.1.139] na ca devadattasya svaguṇākṛṣṭāḥ śarīrādayo bhogāya,
GSP29udnyku1u:393: na ca tadrahitānāmapi bhoga iti yuktimat,
GSP29udnyku1u:399: asatāṃ teṣāṃ kathamutpādakatvamiti cet- tadetadabhimantraṇādiṣvapi tulyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:400: [ku.1.140] tasmādbhāvabhūtamatiśayaṃ janayanta eva prokṣaṇādayaḥ kālāntarabhāvine phalāya kalpante /
GSP29udnyku1u:406: yathā hi devatāviśeṣoddeśena hutāśane havirāhutayaḥ samantrāḥ prayuktāḥ puruṣamabhisaṃskurvate,
GSP29udnyku1u:409: tathā vrīhyādyuddeśena prayujyamānaḥ prokṣaṇādiḥ puruṣameva saṃskurute, na tam /
GSP29udnyku1u:414: [ku.1.142] na tarhi barhiṣa iva vrīhyādeḥ punarupayogāntaraṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:421: yathācābhicārasaṃskāro yaṃ dehamuddiśya prayuktastadapekṣa eva tatsambaddhasyaiva duḥkhamupajanayati nānyasya;
GSP29udnyku1u:423: evamabhimantraṇādisaṃskārā api bhavanto na manāgapi nopayujyante /
GSP29udnyku1u:424: kathaṃ tarhi vrīhyādīnāṃ saṃskāryakarmateti cet- prokṣaṇādiphalasambandhādeva /
GSP29udnyku1u:427: tathā cābhimantraṇādayo vrīhyādyuddeśena pravṛttāḥ ityanumānamiti cet- tanna- havistyāgādibhiranaikāntikatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:428: na hi te kālāntarabhāviphalānuguṇaṃ kiñcit hutāśanādau janayanti /
GSP29udnyku1u:429: kiṃ vā na dṛṣṭamindriyaliṅgaśabdavyāpārāḥ prameyoddaśena pravṛttāḥ pramātaryeva kiñcijjanayanti,
GSP29udnyku1u:431: [ku.1.144] kṛṣicikitse apyevameva syātāmiti cenna- dṛṣṭenaiva pākajarūpādi (38)
GSP29udnyku1u:443: na hyasti sambhavo gokṣīraṃ surabhimadhuraṃ śītam;
GSP29udnyku1u:453: na ca vācyamidānīmapi tathaiva kiṃ na syāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:467: [ku.1.147] yatra tarhi toye tejasi vāyau vā na pākajo viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:470: pārthive pratimādau pratiṣṭhādinā saṃskṛte 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt pūjanādinā dharmo vyatikrame tvadharmaḥ apratiṣṭhite tu na kiñcit /
GSP29udnyku1u:478: tathā svabhāvadravā apyāpo nimittabhedapratibaddhadravatvāḥ kaṭhinaṃ karakādyārabhante ityādi svayamūhanīyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:482: citrādāviva svasādṛśyadarśino rājña iti no darśanam /
GSP29udnyku1u:483: anyeṣāṃ tu pūrvapūrvapūjitapratyabhijñānaviṣayasya pratiṣṭhitapratyabhijñānaviṣayasya ca tathātvamavaseyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:486: kuśalaiveti cenna- na hi sāmagrīdṛṣṭaṃ vighaṭayati;
GSP29udnyku1u:491: viparyaye sarvadā bhaṅgaprasaṅgāt- atrocyate-[ku.1.150] jayetaranimittasya vṛttilābhāya kevalam /
GSP29udnyku1u:494: tāśca karmavibhavānurūpaṃ liṅgamabhivyañjayantī'tyasmākaṃ siddhāntaḥ- tathāpi paravipratipatteranyathocyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:495: tenāpi hi vidhinā tadeva jayasya parājayasya vā nimittamabhivyaktaṃ (49)
GSP29udnyku1u:501: atha vā pratijñānurūpāṃ viśuddhimapekṣya tena dharmo janyate,
GSP29udnyku1u:505: [ku.1.151] atha śaktiniṣedhe kiṃ pramāṇam? na kiñcit /
GSP29udnyku1u:507: na hi no darśane śaktipadārtha eva nāsti /
GSP29udnyku1u:522: asmadabhipretasya cābhāvāderanugrāhakatvamaṅgīkṛtya niḥsādhanā mīmāsaṃkā api na vipratipattumarhanti /
GSP29udnyku1u:529: na bhūtānīti kuto nirṇaya iti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:531: na hi taccharīraṃ tanmanastānīndriyāṇi viśiṣṭānyapi tasyaiveti niyamaḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:541: [ku.1.153] tathāpi tajjanyatayaiva niyamopapattau vipakṣe bādhakaṃ kimiti ceta- kāryakāraṇabhāvabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:546: prakṛte 'pi cetanagatā eva buddhyādayo niyāmakāḥ syuriti cenna;
GSP29udnyku1u:582: tatra mayeti cetanoparāgo darpaṇasyeva mukhoparāgo bhedāgrahādatāttvikaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:583: idamiti viṣayoparāga indriyapraṇāḍikayā pariṇatibhedo darpaṇasyeva niśvāsābhihatasya malinimā pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:586: tena saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātātvikasya sambandho darpaṇapratibimbitasya mukhasyeva malinimnā,
GSP29udnyku1u:590: na ca buddhireva svabhāvataścetaneti yuktam- pariṇāmitvāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:593: tathā hi- kartṛdharmā niyantāraḥ cetitā ca sa eva naḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:610: yadyacca kārye rūpaṃ dṛśyate tasya tasya kāraṇātmakatve rāgādayo 'pi prakṛtau svīkartavyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:615: tayā te tatra santīti cet caitanyamapi tathā bhaviṣyati /
GSP29udnyku1u:622: na tu yāvaddharmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tāvaddharmakaṃ kāryam,
GSP29udnyku1u:633: saukṣmyānna doṣa iti cet- muktāvapi punaḥpravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:638: yogāttena tena śabdena vyapadiśyate śārīravāyuvaditi āgamo 'pi saṅgacchate ityato 'pi heturasiddhaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:650: sambandhamātraṃ vā bhede eva bhede 'pi cacopapadyamānam,
GSP29udnyku1u:662: vāsanāsaṅkramo nāsti na ca gatyantaraṃ sthire //15 //
GSP29udnyku1u:677: kiṃ tu sādṛśyatiraskṛtatvāt drāgeva na vikalpyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:683: api ca-[ku.1.161] na vaijātyaṃ vinā tatsyānna tasminnanumā bhavet /
GSP29udnyku1u:684: vinā tena na tatsiddhirnādhyakṣaṃ niścayaṃ vinā //16 //
GSP29udnyku1u:685: n.a hi, “karaṇākaraṇayostajjātīyasya sataḥ sahakārilābhālābhau tantra'mityabhyupagame kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:687: tadvā tādṛgveti na kaścidviśeṣa iti nyāyāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:689: [ku.1.162] evaṃ ca, “kāraṇavat kārye 'pi kiñcidvaijātyaṃ syāt yasya kāraṇāpekṣā,
GSP29udnyku1u:690: na tu dṛṣṭajātīyasya” iti śaṅkayā na tadutpattisiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:691: dṛṣṭajātīyamākasmikaṃ syāditi cenna- tatrāpi kiñcidanyadeva prayojakaṃ bhaviṣyatītyaviredhāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:693: nāpi kāryasāmānyasyānyaprayojakaṃ dṛśyate” iti cet- tat kiṃ kāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ svagatastatprayojakatayopalabdhaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:701: na hi dhūmasya viśeṣaṃ dahanaprayojyaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ prabhavati /
GSP29udnyku1u:705: [ku.1.163] evaṃ vidhirūpayorvyāvṛttirūpayorvā jātyorvirodhe sati na samāveśaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:711: kuta etat? parasparaparihāreṇa sarvadā vyavasthiteriti cet- nedamapyadhyakṣam /
GSP29udnyku1u:713: (63)tatkāryayoḥ parasparaparihṛtisvabhāvatvāditi cettarhi kampaśiṃśapayoḥ parasparaparihāravatyorna samāveśaḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:714: dṛśyate tāvadidamiti cet- gotvāśvatvayorapi na dṛkṣyata iti kā pratyāśā?
GSP29udnyku1u:723: sa kathaṃ tamatipatyātmānamāsādayediti- cet- evaṃ tarhi śiṃśapāsāmagryantarbhūtā calanasāmagrī /
GSP29udnyku1u:729: na tu tadviśeṣamātrādhīnamiti cet- yadi nodanādayaḥ svabhāvabhūtāḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:738: [ku.1.166] svabhāvabhūtā evāgantukasahakāryanupraveśādbhavantīti cet- evaṃ tarhi vṛkṣasāmagryāmāgantukasahakāryanupraveśādeva śiṃśapāpi jāyata iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:748: kintvāgantavaḥ[ntuka] sahakāriṇa iti cet- evaṃ tarhi tānāsādya sadṛśarūpā api kecit kampakāriṇaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:750: tathā ca tadvā tādṛgveti na kaścidviśeṣa (64) iti syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:754: teṣāṃ tu viruddhānāṃ na samāveśo vyaktibhedāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:758: [ku.1.170] mā bhūdanumānamiti cenna- tena hi vinā (65)
GSP29udnyku1u:766: tato vartamānatvaniścaya eva bhedaniścaya iti cet- kimatra tadabhi[pi] matamāyuṣmataḥ?
GSP29udnyku1u:772: vartamānāvartamānatvamekasya viruddhamiti cet- yadi sadasattvaṃ tat” tanna;
GSP29udnyku1u:777: krameṇānekasambhandha ekasyānupapanna iti cet- astitāvadato nirūpaṇīyam kṣaṇapratyayastu bhrānto 'pi nāstīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:782: etāvatāpi siddhaṃ samīhitaṃ cārvākasyeti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:786: n.a hi sthire taddarśane vā svarasavāhī sandehaḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:790: tathā hi- prāmāṇyāsiddhau sandeho 'pi na siddhyet;
GSP29udnyku1u:797: lūnapunarjātakeśādau vyabhicāradarśanāditi cet- na ekatvaniścayasya tvayāpīṣṭatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:799: siddhyatu, yatra viruddhadharmaviraha iti cet- tenaiva sthiratvamapi niścīyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:800: sa iha sandihyata iti cet- tulyametat /
GSP29udnyku1u:811: sthirasyaikasvabhāvatvāditi cet- ucyate-[ku.1.175] hetuśaktimanādṛtya nīlādyapi na vastusat /
GSP29udnyku1u:812: tadyuktaṃ tatra tat śaktamiti sādhāraṇaṃ na kim //18 //
GSP29udnyku1u:813: sarvasādhāraṇanīlādivaidharmyeṇ.a kālpanikatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya vyutpādayatā nīlādi pāramārthikamevābhyupagantavyam,
GSP29udnyku1u:815: na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpāramārthikatve nīlādi pāramārthikaṃ bhavitumarhati,
GSP29udnyku1u:835: janito hi tena sa tasya syāt, nityo vā /
GSP29udnyku1u:845: bhāve vā sa eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:846: atrocyate-[ku.1.178] pūrvabhāvo hi hetutvaṃ mīyate yena kenacit /
GSP29udnyku1u:853: anyathā kāryāt kāraṇānumānaṃ kvāpi na syāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:858: anyatra tathā darśanāditi cenna- bādhena saṅkocāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:862: sarvavyāpakānāṃ sarvān pratyanvayamātraviśeṣe kāraṇatvaprasaṅgo bādhakamiti cenna- anvayavyatirekavajjātīyatayā vipakṣe bādhakena ca viśeṣe 'natiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:863: tathā hi- kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇavad dṛṣṭamityadṛṣṭāśrayamapi tajjātīyakāraṇakam- āśrayābhāve kiṃ pratyāsannam asamavāyikāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:865: tathā cānutpattiḥ satatotpattirvā sarvatrotpattirvā syāt evamapi nimittasya sāmarthyādeva niyatadeśotpāde sa eva deśo 'vaśyāpekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:866: tathā ca sāmānyato deśasiddhau itarapṛthivyādibādhe tadatiriktasiddhiṃ ko vārayet /
GSP29udnyku1u:868: [ku.1.180] ityeṣā sahakāriśaktirasamā māyā durunnītitaḥ mūlatvātprakṛtiḥ prabodhabhayato 'vidyeti yasyoditā /
GSP29udnyku1u:869: devo 'sau virataprapañcaracanākallolakolāhalaḥ sākṣātsākṣitayā manasyabhiratiṃ badhnātu śānto mama //20 //
